Title: Enacts the city of Dunkirk fiscal recovery act
Summary: Enacts the city of Dunkirk fiscal recovery act; authorizes the issuance of deficit bonds and notes not to exceed eighteen million five hundred thousand dollars for the purpose of liquidating actual deficits in its general fund, water fund, and the capital projects fund of such city; requires review of city budgets and financial reports by the state comptroller; repeals provisions after 15 years.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to the city of Dunkirk fiscal recovery act; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
